divs: sighting detailswas taking dogs out in back yard. saw a flash from north (i believe) over my house (by ellington airforce base, nasa is close too)around a second later i heard what could best be described as a medium calibre gunshot from the same direction. i immediatly though "about a mile away" and tried to see around the house. got my dogs inside, as they got very excited\antsy and opened the window to that direction to keep an eye out.
Summary: FLASH of quick blue light lit up clouds - short noise unlike thunder
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around August 27th 2011
